strategy: Apply a random forest model with feature selection via mutual information and introduce class-weighted sampling to address class imbalance in survival outcomes, focusing on engineering binary interaction features (e.g., "Age & Pclass" or "SibSp & Parch") derived from raw passenger data.

import numpy as np
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
